languages.text: "Кроме того, Ваша Светлость, серьезную проблему для ваших владений представляют пираты. Группа бандитов во главе с кораблем "Неуловимое презрение" столетиями безнаказанно разоряла грузовые суда, идущие от самых щедрых экстракциумов протектората, и ловко уходила от преследовавших их патрулей. Флагман пиратов был замечен в одной из систем поблизости — мощи вашего корабля, Лорд-капитан, хватит, чтобы наконец нагнать зарвавшихся мерзавцев и призвать их к ответу".

traits.locale_text: "Кроме того, Ваша Светлость, серьезную проблему для ваших владений представляют пираты. Группа бандитов во главе с кораблем "Неуловимое презрение" столетиями безнаказанно разоряла грузовые суда, идущие от самых щедрых экстракциумов протектората, и ловко уходила от преследовавших их патрулей. Флагман пиратов был замечен в одной из систем поблизости — мощи вашего корабля, Лорд-капитан, хватит, чтобы наконец нагнать зарвавшихся мерзавцев и призвать их к ответу".
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "In addition to that, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, pirates have presented a serious problem for your domain. For centuries, a group of bandits headed by a ship called the Elusive Contempt has been raiding cargo vessels on their way from the protectorate's most plentiful extractia. Their ability to deftly escape pursuit by patrols has allowed them to operate with complete impunity. The pirates' flagship has been spotted in a nearby system. Your ship, Lord Captain, is sufficiently powerful to finally chase down those brazen scoundrels and bring them to justice."
languages.original_text: "Кроме того, Ваша Светлость, серьезную проблему для ваших владений представляют пираты. Группа бандитов во главе с кораблем "Неуловимое презрение" столетиями безнаказанно разоряла грузовые суда, идущие от самых щедрых экстракциумов протектората, и ловко уходила от преследовавших их патрулей. For centuries, a group of bandits headed by a ship called the Elusive Contempt has been raiding cargo vessels on their way from the protectorate's most plentiful extractia. Their ability to deftly escape pursuit by patrols has allowed them to operate with complete impunity. The pirates' flagship has been spotted in a nearby system. Your ship, Lord Captain, is sufficiently powerful to finally chase down those brazen scoundrels and bring them to justice."

languages.text: “除此之外，大人，流窜的海盗对您的王朝构成了严重的威胁。几百年来，有一伙海盗一直在袭击王朝的货船，那群海盗头领的旗舰叫做‘诡秘蔑视号’。这么多年来，他们一直都巧妙地躲避着巡逻队的追捕，肆无忌惮地四处劫掠。我们在附近的某个星系中发现了那群海盗的旗舰。您的舰船有足够的力量消灭那群厚颜无耻的混账，将他们绳之以法，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "In addition to that, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, pirates have presented a serious problem for your domain. For centuries, a group of bandits headed by a ship called the Elusive Contempt has been raiding cargo vessels on their way from the protectorate's most plentiful extractia. Their ability to deftly escape pursuit by patrols has allowed them to operate with complete impunity. The pirates' flagship has been spotted in a nearby system. Your ship, Lord Captain, is sufficiently powerful to finally chase down those brazen scoundrels and bring them to justice."

traits.locale_text: “除此之外，大人，流窜的海盗对您的王朝构成了严重的威胁。几百年来，有一伙海盗一直在袭击王朝的货船，那群海盗头领的旗舰叫做‘诡秘蔑视号’。这么多年来，他们一直都巧妙地躲避着巡逻队的追捕，肆无忌惮地四处劫掠。我们在附近的某个星系中发现了那群海盗的旗舰。您的舰船有足够的力量消灭那群厚颜无耻的混账，将他们绳之以法，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Zudem, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, hat Euer Reich ein großes Problem mit Piraten. Seit Jahrhunderten treibt eine Gruppe von Banditen mit einem Flaggschiff namens Flüchtige Verachtung ihr Unwesen. Sie überfallen Handelsschiffe, die von den reichsten Extractia des Protektorats kommen. Sie verstehen es sehr geschickt, sich der Verfolgung durch die Patrouillen zu entziehen, weshalb sie nahezu ungestraft walten können. Das Flaggschiff der Piraten wurde in einem System in der Nähe gesichtet. Euer Schiff, Lord Captain, ist ausreichend stark, um diese dreisten Halunken endlich zur Strecke zu bringen."
languages.original_text: "In addition to that, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, pirates have presented a serious problem for your domain. For centuries, a group of bandits headed by a ship called the Elusive Contempt has been raiding cargo vessels on their way from the protectorate's most plentiful extractia. Their ability to deftly escape pursuit by patrols has allowed them to operate with complete impunity. The pirates' flagship has been spotted in a nearby system. Your ship, Lord Captain, is sufficiently powerful to finally chase down those brazen scoundrels and bring them to justice."

traits.locale_text: "Zudem, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, hat Euer Reich ein großes Problem mit Piraten. Seit Jahrhunderten treibt eine Gruppe von Banditen mit einem Flaggschiff namens Flüchtige Verachtung ihr Unwesen. Sie überfallen Handelsschiffe, die von den reichsten Extractia des Protektorats kommen. Sie verstehen es sehr geschickt, sich der Verfolgung durch die Patrouillen zu entziehen, weshalb sie nahezu ungestraft walten können. Das Flaggschiff der Piraten wurde in einem System in der Nähe gesichtet. Euer Schiff, Lord Captain, ist ausreichend stark, um diese dreisten Halunken endlich zur Strecke zu bringen."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «Además, mi{mf|lord|lady}, la piratería constituye un serio problema en sus dominios. Durante siglos, un grupo de bandidos encabezado por una nave que se conoce como el Odio Escurridizo se ha dedicado a asaltar navíos mercantes procedentes de las explotaciones más fructíferas del protectorado. Su capacidad para eludir hábilmente nuestras patrullas les ha permitido operar con total impunidad. La nave insignia de los piratas se ha divisado en un sistema cercano. Su propia nave, Lord Capitán, es lo bastante poderosa para dar caza a esos granujas insolentes y llevarlos ante la justicia».
languages.original_text: "In addition to that, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, pirates have presented a serious problem for your domain. For centuries, a group of bandits headed by a ship called the Elusive Contempt has been raiding cargo vessels on their way from the protectorate's most plentiful extractia. Their ability to deftly escape pursuit by patrols has allowed them to operate with complete impunity. The pirates' flagship has been spotted in a nearby system. Your ship, Lord Captain, is sufficiently powerful to finally chase down those brazen scoundrels and bring them to justice."

traits.locale_text: «Además, mi{mf|lord|lady}, la piratería constituye un serio problema en sus dominios. Durante siglos, un grupo de bandidos encabezado por una nave que se conoce como el Odio Escurridizo se ha dedicado a asaltar navíos mercantes procedentes de las explotaciones más fructíferas del protectorado. Su capacidad para eludir hábilmente nuestras patrullas les ha permitido operar con total impunidad. La nave insignia de los piratas se ha divisado en un sistema cercano. Su propia nave, Lord Capitán, es lo bastante poderosa para dar caza a esos granujas insolentes y llevarlos ante la justicia».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « De plus, Votre Seigneurie, les pirates représentent une menace non négligeable pour votre domaine. Depuis des siècles, un groupe de bandits menés par un vaisseau nommé l'Insaisissable Avanie s'en prend aux cargos en provenance du système le plus riche du protectorat. Leur capacité à échapper à nos patrouilles leur permet d'agir en toute impunité. Récemment, le vaisseau amiral de ces pirates a été repéré dans un système voisin. Comme votre vaisseau est assez puissant pour traquer ces vauriens impudents, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, vous pourriez en profiter pour leur infliger enfin le châtiment qu'ils méritent. »
languages.original_text: "In addition to that, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, pirates have presented a serious problem for your domain. For centuries, a group of bandits headed by a ship called the Elusive Contempt has been raiding cargo vessels on their way from the protectorate's most plentiful extractia. Their ability to deftly escape pursuit by patrols has allowed them to operate with complete impunity. The pirates' flagship has been spotted in a nearby system. Your ship, Lord Captain, is sufficiently powerful to finally chase down those brazen scoundrels and bring them to justice."

traits.locale_text: « De plus, Votre Seigneurie, les pirates représentent une grande menace pour votre domaine. Depuis des siècles, un groupe de bandits menés par un vaisseau nommé l'Outrage fugace s'en prend aux cargos en provenance du système le plus riche du protectorat. Leur capacité à échapper à nos patrouilles leur permet d'agir en toute impunité. Récemment, le vaisseau amiral de ces pirates a été repéré dans un système voisin. Comme votre vaisseau est assez puissant pour traquer ces vauriens impudents, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, vous pourriez en profiter pour leur infliger enfin le châtiment qu'ils méritent. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「それに閣下、海賊はあなたの領地にとって深刻な問題をもたらしています。何世紀もの間、エルーシブ・コンタンプトと呼ばれる船が率いる盗賊の一団が、保護領の最も豊富な採掘場から出発した貨物船を襲撃してきました。パトロール隊の追跡を巧みに逃れる手腕により、彼らは完全に罰を受けることなく活動していました。海賊の旗艦が近くの星系で発見されました。ロード・キャプテン、あなたの船は、あの図々しい悪党どもを追い詰め、裁きを受けさせるに十分な力を持っています」
languages.original_text: "In addition to that, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, pirates have presented a serious problem for your domain. For centuries, a group of bandits headed by a ship called the Elusive Contempt has been raiding cargo vessels on their way from the protectorate's most plentiful extractia. Their ability to deftly escape pursuit by patrols has allowed them to operate with complete impunity. The pirates' flagship has been spotted in a nearby system. Your ship, Lord Captain, is sufficiently powerful to finally chase down those brazen scoundrels and bring them to justice."

traits.locale_text: 「それに閣下、海賊はあなたの領地にとって深刻な問題をもたらしています。何世紀もの間、エルーシブ・コンタンプトと呼ばれる船が率いる盗賊の一団が、保護領の最も豊富な採掘場から出発した貨物船を襲撃してきました。パトロール隊の追跡を巧みに逃れる手腕により、彼らは完全に罰を受けることなく活動していました。海賊の旗艦が近くの星系で発見されました。ロード・キャプテン、あなたの船は、あの図々しい悪党どもを追い詰め、裁きを受けさせるに十分な力を持っています」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Tüm bunlara ek olarak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, diyarınızda ciddi bir korsan sorunu baş gösterdi. Kaçkın Kibir adındaki geminin önderliğindeki bir grup haydut, yüzlerce yıldır protektoranın en bereketli ayıklacından dönen kargo gemilerini yağmalıyormuş. Devriyelerden hızla kaçabilme kabiliyetleri, hiç ceza çekmeden faaliyetlerine devam etmelerini sağlamış. Korsanların sancak gemisi, yakın bir sistemde tespit edildi. Geminiz o yüzsüz hainleri sonunda yakalayabilecek ve adalete teslim edebilecek kadar güçlü Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "In addition to that, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, pirates have presented a serious problem for your domain. For centuries, a group of bandits headed by a ship called the Elusive Contempt has been raiding cargo vessels on their way from the protectorate's most plentiful extractia. Their ability to deftly escape pursuit by patrols has allowed them to operate with complete impunity. The pirates' flagship has been spotted in a nearby system. Your ship, Lord Captain, is sufficiently powerful to finally chase down those brazen scoundrels and bring them to justice."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm bunlara ek olarak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, korsanlar sizin diyarınızda ciddi bir problem teşkil ettiler. Yüzlerce yıldır Kaypak Kibir adındaki bir gemi tarafından yönetilen bir grup haydut, protektoranın en bereketli parçasından dönerken kargo gemilerini yağmalıyormuş. Devriyelerden hızla kaçabilme kabiliyetleri, hiç ceza almadan faaliyetlerine devam etmelerini sağlamış. Korsanların sancak gemisi, yakın bir sistemde tespit edildi. Lord Kaptan, sizin geminiz o yüzsüz hainleri sonunda yakalayabilecek ve adalete teslim edebilecek kadar güçlü."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster
